name: Kit Out Your House
description:
Old man Terrence is a sucker for new stuff, and he’s fixin’ for a good old-fashioned house upgrade! Tap on your Android device to redecorate the place and give the old coot something to smile about. Don’t get too crazy and run out of space with your wild renovations, will you?

You can also collect coins to purchase new items… or at least, you would be able to! Unfortunately, we didn’t have nearly enough time to implement everything we had planned, including a shop system, new rooms, extra floors, the ability to pick things up and (of course!) sound effects. Hopefully you enjoy what we do have available, at least! Just be aware that there is no ‘endgame’ at the current moment.

Here’s a little look at the kind of stuff we had planned:

Thank you very much for playing our game! Let us know what you think down in the comments, and good luck making your purrfect house.

  • Programming: Mark Boyde-Shaw (@Rulrite)
  • Music: Jonathan Brooks (@Tautos)
  • Cats: Fiona Houlgreave (@Capernoited)
  • Design and Art: All of us!

Made for Ludum Dare 42 in 72 hours.
